title: Train to Busan
review: This is not a very unique story; a derivative zombie survival adventure, but it was executed very well. Really fun to watch, and it has some of the zombiest zombies I've ever seen. At the start there is quite a lot of product placement, but the brands don't want their logos to be splattered with blood so it stops when the zombies arrive. The little girl has two Wiis and a 3DS, so she should have been playing Dead Rising or something to prepare.
